info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 07 at 1:28PM MST until December 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Ground blizzard conditions expected. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier National Park and adjacent foothills and plains. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Periodic whiteout conditions will cause dangerous travel conditions.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
